product_name: Goal Zero Rock Out 2 Portable Speaker
long_description: Take epic sound anywhere with the Goal Zero Rock Out 2 portable speaker. Amped-up sound and toned-down size fit the bill for all your excursions and impromptu dance parties. Rock Out 2 amplifies tunes from your MP3, phone or laptop for over 20 hrs. without draining battery power from your device. Innovative chamber with DarkBass technology delivers precise, high-quality sound. Designed for outdoor adventures, the rugged and water-resistant shell protects the speaker. Recharge anywhere, anytime-juice up the internal lithium battery in 3 hrs. from USB, or from the sun using the Nomad 7 solar panel (sold separately). Works with MP3 players, cell phones, smartphones, tablets, laptops, personal gaming devices and more. Controls include on/off switch, previous song, play/pause, next song and volume; ports include 3.5mm male output, 3.5mm female input and USB. 3W lithium-ion battery features hundreds of charge cycles, a three-month shelf life, and built-in charging and low-battery protection. The Goal Zero Rock Out 2 portable speaker operates in temps ranging from 32deg to 104degF (0deg to 40degC).
short_description: Take epic sound anywhere with the Goal Zero Rock Out 2 portable speaker. Amped-up sound and toned-down size fit the bill for all your excursions and impromptu dance parties.
